channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Premiere Elements
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Premiere Elements

item.title: CVE-2021-40787|2024-09-16T17:47:43.309Z -- adobe -- premiere%20elements
item.description: Adobe Premiere Elements 20210809.daily.2242976 (and earlier) is affected by a memory corruption vulnerability due to insecure handling of a malicious file, potentially resulting in arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user. User interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-40786|2024-09-16T20:02:31.904Z -- adobe -- premiere%20elements
item.description: Adobe Premiere Elements 20210809.daily.2242976 (and earlier) is affected by a memory corruption vulnerability due to insecure handling of a malicious file, potentially resulting in arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user. User interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability.
